name: Extinct (Nemesis Games) (Nemesis Games)
description:
EXTINCT

extinct

/ɛkˈstɪŋkt/

no longer in existence.

How could an asteroid impact possibly wipe out the entire dinosaur species?

A chunk of rock twice the size of Mount Everest and travelling twice the speed of a bullet strikes the Earth. The collision itself released a billion times more energy than the bombs used in World War II killing all the dinosaurs and plants.

Play EXTINCT to escape asteroid impacts.

Credits

Models : Animated LowPoly Dinosaurs by quaternius,

Stylized Earth by In Your Face,

Low Poly Rock Pack by Broken Vector.

Music : Free Loops by Slonca Szum.

Sound Effects : FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom,

Footstep(Snow and Grass) by MGWSoundDesign,

Grenade Sound FX by MGWSoundDesign.

Visual Effects : Polygonal's Low-Poly Particle Pack by Polygonal Stuff.

Font : Lexend Giga by Bonnie Shaver-Troup and Thomas Jockin.
